file-changes.file: File Upload
file-changes.explanation:
I've made the following improvements to the CSS:
1. Added a container div to center the content and give it a white background. 2. Improved the overall layout using flexbox for better centering and responsiveness. 3. Updated the color scheme to use more modern and appealing colors. 4. Added a box shadow to the container for depth. 5. Improved the styling of the file input and submit button. 6. Added hover effects to the submit button for better interactivity. 7. Made the font sizes more consistent and appropriate for each element. 8. Added some padding and margin adjustments for better spacing. 9. Made the design more responsive by using relative units and max-width.
These changes will make the file upload page more visually appealing, user-friendly, and responsive across different screen sizes.
